definition: structure consisting of an artificial heap or bank usually of earth or stones, form into a hill
details:
noun
- structure consisting of an artificial heap or bank usually of earth or stones
= synonyms: mound
- (baseball) the slight elevation on which the pitcher stands
= synonyms: mound
- a local and well-defined elevation of the land
= example: a local and well-defined elevation of the land
verb
- form into a hill
